Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: The reason why we are being so careful about this is that having a robust upgrade is the absolute top priority for a build on which we can base the installation of validator nodes for Alpha. If the software is flaky, but we can upgrade it, all is well. But if the upgrade doesn't work like a charm, we are in serious trouble because we will have to do manual upgrades. Thus, we must be totally confident of this one feature. Please indicate your level of confidence, ~andrey.goncharov , that the first build after the one with fixes from INDY-29 will upgrade flawlessly–we will use that plus the above criteria to decide if we are truly done.
